---
title: 2Keys
author: ''
date: '2022-11-16'
slug: 2keys
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $50.0M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with 2Keys. The average
  contract duration was 3.07 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $15.8M. The longest
  contract was 15.01 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $125.7M.
lookup_name: '2KEYS'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '50.0M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '25'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '13'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '52%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '2288%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '2'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '93.1M'
s424_mean_duration: '3.07'
s421_mean_contract_value: '15.8M'
s425_max_duration: '15.01'
s422_max_contract_value: '125.7M'
---
